text:
Deborah Ross née Koff (born June 20, 1963) is an American lawyer and politician. She is the U.S. Representative for. Ross was a Democratic member of the North Carolina General Assembly.
Ross was the Democratic nominee in the 2016 U.S. Senate election in North Carolina, unsuccessfully challenging incumbent Richard Burr in the general election.

annotations.surface_form: 2016 U.S. Senate election in North Carolina
